InstructionData.Title: Grow Light Controller
InstructionData.Author: onebit
InstructionData.Instructions:
# Grow Light Controller # Turns light on during the day # to supplement light alias DaylightSensor d0 define GROWLIGHTHASH HASH("StructureGrowLight") alias daytime r0
loop: l daytime DaylightSensor Activate s db Setting daytime sb GROWLIGHTHASH On daytime
yield j loop
